dialog.teller: Hi, this is a real picture of a meadow, some mountains, and river. Let's start
In the foreground, half of bottom image, there is a green grassy meadow. If the picture was a clock, this meadow covers nine to four
within the meadow, there are large boulders, mostly around nine o'clock
that's it for the meadow part. At the three to four o'clock sliver, there is river or lake.
Above the left side of the boulders, nine o'clock, there are four to five tall skinny evergreen trees that extend to the top of the photo.
now for the background, behind the trees and above the water
fist third is green hillside, middle third is brown rocky mountains
the top most third is light blue clouds and sky, that's it

dialog.drawer: I think I did the best I could do. I think you did too.
